name: country cottage beanie
sizes_available: baby, child, teen/adult small, adult large
notes:
* please note this is the ad-free, easy to print, pdf version of this pattern. you can find the free version on my blog, www.theturtletrunk.com *

the country cottage beanie features gorgeous texture and a ribbed, fold over brim. the instructions include 4 sizes: baby, child, teen/adult small, and adult large. this crochet beanie is worked from the top down and has a snug, comfortable fit. the country cottage beanie is suitable for both men and women, and kids, so you can make a matching set for everyone in the family!


difficulty: advanced beginner / easy

standard us crochet terms

pattern includes:
- detailed written instructions
- instructions for 4 sizes: baby, child, teen/adult small, adult large
- gauge pattern
- link to the free video tutorial
- photos for reference

supplies needed: medium (4) weight yarn, 5.50mm (i) hook, yarn needle, and scissors
